Detailed Description

An ordered collection of attributes.

See Also
Attribute, Waypoint classes

Member Function Documentation

Index Chronicle::AttributeList::add ( Attribute *  attribute)

Adds attribute to the end of the list.

Note
The list assumes ownership of attribute.
Parameters
attributeThe attribute to add.
Returns
The position of the attribute in the list.
See Also
at(), count()
Attribute* Chronicle::AttributeList::at ( Index  index) const

Returns the attribute at the specified position in the list.

Warning
Do not destroy the returned attribute.
Parameters
indexA value in the range of [0 .. count() - 1].
Returns
The pointer to the attribute, or NULL if the index is out of range.
See Also
count(), isEmpty()
AttributeList* Chronicle::AttributeList::clone ( ) const

Returns a copy of the attribute list.

See Also
Attribute::clone()
Index Chronicle::AttributeList::count ( ) const

Returns the number of items in the list.

See Also
isEmpty()
Attribute* Chronicle::AttributeList::find ( const String &  name) const

Searches the list for an attribute for a specific name.

Warning
Do not destroy the returned attribute.
Returns
The first attribute in the list with the name name, or NULL if no attribute in the list has that name.
bool Chronicle::AttributeList::isEmpty ( ) const

Returns true if the list has no items, otherwise false.

See Also
count()
Attribute* Chronicle::AttributeList::remove ( Attribute *  attribute)

Removes attribute from the list.

Parameters
attributeThe attribute to remove.
Returns
If successful, the pointer to the attribute, otherwise NULL.
Note
The caller assumes ownership of the attribute.
Attribute* Chronicle::AttributeList::removeAt ( Index  index)

Removes the attribute at the specified position in the list.

Parameters
indexA value in the range of [0 .. count() - 1].
Returns
If successful, the pointer to the attribute, otherwise NULL.
Note
The caller assumes ownership of the attribute.
See Also
count(), at()
